name: FBMG (Famous Bus Movie Game) LD34
description:
______________________________________________________________

A young cop must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.
______________________________________________________________

City is generated uniquely each game, no 2 highways are the same. The controls are A and D, for steer left and right.
______________________________________________________________

Play with the Unity web player- If Chrome doesn't work, Firefox should.
______________________________________________________________

Created for Ludum Dare 34 (Theme: 'Two-button Control') in under 48 hours

Vote here:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...
